This package includes 20+ Wells currently in-game and will include additional wells as they are released.
This package includes all 30+ Orbs currently in-game and will include additional orbs as they are released.
This package includes 20+ Cardbacks currently in-game and will include additional cardbacks as they are released.
This package includes 50+ Avatars currently in-game and will include additional avatars as they are released.

- Doubled XP - from everything!
- Earn Battle Chests and Shards at twice the normal rate.
- 10 ADDITIONAL Deck Slots
- Premium card back
- Golden Faeria logo
- 5 Mythic Chests full of cosmetics
- Bonus shards
- 40 new puzzles, from low to extreme difficulty.\n- The equivalent of 10 Mythic Chests in rewards\n- Unlock the ability to earn the 'Elements' card back

- 40 new cards unlocked
- Introduction of the Corrupt keyword
- Introduction of Subtypes: Yaks, Rakoans, and Beasts!
- Unique cosmetic set

Unlock the Premium Faeria experience!

This package provides a mixture of accelerated progress and exclusive items. Maximize your time spent in Faeria with DOUBLE XP, more deck slots, special cosmetics and more.

Looking to get the most out of Faeria? This content is for you.

Your usual puzzle master, Jalmyr, has stepped aside and allowed the elements to take over.

This Puzzle Pack for Faeria contains 40 additional brain-twisting challenges for you to complete.

Can you overcome the elements?

Warning: Many of these puzzles are quite difficult!
Emperor Kaios has consumed the Fruit of Everlife, unleashing a terrible corruption into the Oversky. Band together with the Yaks and Rakoans to fight it off!

Corruption spreads across the world, threatening to taint all things good and pure. New monsters and wicked men flock to the Imperial banner, hoping to share in the spoils of war.\n\nDespite suffering great losses, hope blooms in the hearts of those who choose to fight back. Victory, against all odds, appears to be possible with new allies joining the cause.

Emperor Kaios has been defeated and the Oversky is saved.

In search for a solution to a new impending cataclysm, the crew of the Gagana venture out into uncharted territory.

They will encounter new civilizations, new continents, new creatures.... and in the end: the Treasures of Gagana.
But which gods, exactly, are we to pray to?
The soldier, above all others, prays for peace.
Our gods do not determine who is right... only who is left.
As much as our world changes... It always stays the same.
